Glossar

source root

the top level directory of the source tree

build root

the top level directory of the build tree. The build tree is located by default in source root/build. The setting could be changed in the SConstruct file.

SConstruct

top level scons configuration file

SConstrict

scons configuration file located in sub dirs. The format of the SConscript file is documentated in the Sconscript format page

proposal state

means that the related page or chapter is in a proposal state and need to be reviewed by the build system guru's

specification state

means that the related page or chapter is a valid specification and could be implemented
